sense.name: an association of skilled workers of a common craft or trade
sense.examples: He joined a potters' guild in Seattle. The guilds of the Middle Ages had master craftsmen who taught the apprentices. -

sense.name: species which live together and use the same ecological resources
sense.examples: These species of fish comprise a feeding guild on the coral reef. Foliage-gleaning insectivorous birds that live in a common region form a guild.
